name: Cardcandy
overview:
Cardcandy is an online paper goods retailer and design community focused on providing awe-inspiring printed designs on beautiful, eco-friendly materials.

Cardcandy is a hip community of designers from all over the world. We brainstorm, organize design contests, discuss effective design techniques, offer constructive criticism and sell fantastic designs.

We are committed to providing excellent products to our customers, a welcoming community forum for designers and customers, and a commitment to the environment by using sustainable materials and printing practices.

Cardcandy customers are more than customers to us- they’re part of our family. Not only do our customers purchase our products, but they stick around after the purchase to participate in voting on designs and commenting in our forums. Our customers help shape Cardcandy.

Our designers range from well-known industry professionals, to part-time hobbyists. Our design competitions provide an equal playing field for everyone. Designers are paid cash prizes for winning designs and they’re also paid a 10% ongoing commission each time their winning design sells.
